t: HILL HOUSE Creator Mike Flanagan Is Leaving Netflix For Amazon Prime Video
s: March 17, 2024 - One of the most reliable and respected men in all of horror is moving from Netflix to Amazon Prime Video. Mike Flanagan, who delivered shows like The Haunting of Hill House to Netflix has signed a new overall deal with Amazon, alongside his creative partner Trevor Macy.
